text.title: Former President of Brazil, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, detained as part of corruption investigations
text.head: Former President of Brazil, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, detained as part of corruption investigations
Sources

list.item: AFP /PTI. "Brazil's ex-president Lula defiant after detention" — Business Standard , March 5, 2016
Brad Haynes and Anthony Boadle. "Brazil's Lula detained in corruption probe; Rousseff objects" — Reuters , March 5, 2016
"Why is Brazil ex-leader Lula caught up in corruption scandal?" — BBC News Online , March 4, 2016
